website_summaries.verdict: Sony's X1000V offers power and performance in a package that goes head-to-head with the GoPro.
pros: The X1000V houses a ton of useful features for action lovers, plus it can record at 4K 100Mbps in Sony's efficient XAVC S codec
There's built-in image stabilization and the camera offers exposure compensation and white balance control
To top it all off, the X1000V records great quality 4K video
cons: Menu response times when tweaking settings on the camera can be slow, while the lens casing gets smeary and droplets clings to the front when you shoot in and out of the water

customer_reviews.title: i love this cam
customer_reviews.text: i really love my sony 4k action cam. i shot this video with it  i own the sony mini, and a panasonic 4k action cam, but this is my default camera. easy to use. do yourself a favor and get the combo with the little wrist mounted screen though. it really helps to frame your shot. most critical reviews talk about the curving of the edges of the shot due to the fish eye type wide angle. it is significant, but overall this is my favorite little travel camera.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer one

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat 4K on a 65" tv
customer_reviews.text: Got some great under water scuba video after we completed our course. Very clear. Can hear all the bubbles and underwater noises.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this camera. Pictures is amazing and easy to use. I wish it would allow me to change the angle as the AS-15 does but still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: M.Jones

customer_reviews.title: 1. The camera overheats. 2. PNY Micro ...
customer_reviews.text: 1. The camera overheats. 2. PNY Micro SD Card, 4K & U3 is not compatible when recording in 4K or HD, 100mbps 3. The recording time is beneficial.

customer_reviews.title: Great price at $530
customer_reviews.text: Great price at $530!!! Got their last one!!! I was expecting something wrong with it or it was a refurb. But everything looks new BNIB!!! Thanks guys!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, the best camera on the market with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, the best camera on the market with the best price! Excellent customer service! The are so passion and carful to every customer!

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Own GoPro. One case. Great video and still pictures. Simple to set up and begin using.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit. Very user-friendly, shoots awesome video and very reliable.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent action video
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound and video quality. Image stabilization is very good. Light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality way better than a gopro imo. Especially in low light and image stabilization. Might wanna pick up an extra battery though it only last about an hour. If you wanna shoot 4k you want a memory card with a write speed of 95mbps
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Best action camera I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best action camera I have ever used. Not sure why they dont advertise the GpS feature and speed overlay. Perfect for trackdays. Motorcycle, car, bike, whatever you can get cool speed and location info. Perfect seller. Fast ship
customer_reviews.author: Robert W

customer_reviews.title: I do like the camera
customer_reviews.text: I do like the camera. I used it to record about 15 minutes of video so far, and was very surprised the battery didn't last. I guess I need to order spare batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Product was fine but it came without the 1/4 20 adapter making ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was fine but it came without the 1/4 20 adapter making it impossible to use without the waterproof case.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and the quality is second to none in all formats (i.e. 1080p, 4k, etc).
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynBNR

customer_reviews.title: Returning it for another one of the excellent Sony AS200V cameras
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointing: - Steady Shot is not available in 4K mode. - Max frame rate is 30 fps in 4Kmode, vs. 60 fps in HD mode. - Minimum focus distance on this camera is over 19", whereas the other Sony action cams focus down to 11 7/8". Too many give backs for 4K. Returning it for another one of the excellent Sony AS200V cameras.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cooley

customer_reviews.title: I really think they should have explained this better. I've never heard of an action cam having ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel seriously ripped off by Sony on this camera. Everything looks seriously warped due to the fisheye lens. I had a very similar looking different Sony action cam before, and it did not have a fisheye lens. I really think they should have explained this better. I've never heard of an action cam having a fisheye lens, total shock.
customer_reviews.author: Zwamys

customer_reviews.title: Too much distortion at 4K.
customer_reviews.text: Too much distortion at 4K. Look like fisheye lens! footage unusable!
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: impossible to have sound on the regular speed, instructions on this are totally inadaquit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No way to hold it and shoot video.. ...
customer_reviews.text: No way to hold it and shoot video...i wish i could trade it for something else, but i guess i wanted too long...I have never used it seems very complicated, but i could learn it except unless i place on an object, i can not hold it well in my hand and use it Alan Shinall
customer_reviews.author: Alan Shinall

customer_reviews.title: Incredible camera with outstanding quality and features
customer_reviews.text: Sony made an amazing action camera in this 4K! The quality is outstanding, the design is sleek and portable, and the features are incredible. It has GPS, wifi, great speakers, a monopod, and it creates highlight video. It's just unbelievable. I enjoy that you can take stills as well. I am not very technologically inclined, yet it was still relatively easy to figure out. All of the other reviewers were very helpful in learning more of what this can do, as well. Great camera, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Chopin

customer_reviews.title: There is a youtube video comparison to the Hero4 Black available
customer_reviews.text: markhawkcam has just posted a comparison of the sony to the Hero 4 black. Search youtube for : Sony FDR-X1000V vs GoPro Hero4 BLACK HD it is a 23 minute with side by side comparisons between the two cameras. From what you can see in the video, it is clear the sony is a better camera than the Hero4 black and by a large margin.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Great underwater video and pics
customer_reviews.text: This camera take awesome video and still shots. However for underwater pics or video you need to buy an underwater housing and underwater lens $20(looks like a square) other wise all your video and pics will be blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Athena B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate and the WiFi features actually work pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Clean image. Easy to operate and the WiFi features actually work pretty reliably. [...]
customer_reviews.author: F. Tells

customer_reviews.title: Need replacement lense!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this camera for over 3 years and absolutely love it!! My lense now has a few scratches cause a slight blur on the left side of the video. Does anyone know a good replacement lense and where to purchase?
customer_reviews.author: Orlando G.

customer_reviews.title: Action!
customer_reviews.text: I never had a video camera before; the only ones I used were rented for a day or two. That was back in the 90s when they were still pretty big. By comparison this is a lot smaller, though maybe not as small as your phone. But unlike your phone this is a dedicated video camera with probably better resolution too. Now I can finally make a sequel to my epic version of "The Hunchback of Notre Dame" acted out with action figures.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Fraser

product_meta.title: Sony FDR-X1000VR/W 4K Action Cam and LiveView Remote Kit
product_meta.description:
Style:w/ Live View Remote| Configuration:BaseGrab pro-level footage in gorgeous 4K resolution, with advanced image stabilization to counteract vibration and 240p recording for super slow-motion HD video. All in a splash proof body with manual controls, stereo mic with wind noise-reduction and built-in Wi-Fi. You can even edit your best moves into one video with included Highlight Movie Maker software.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



4K ACTION CAM WITH LIVE VIEW REMOTE BUNDLE
Grab pro-level footage in gorgeous 4K resolution, with advanced image stabilization to counteract vibration and 240p recording for super slow-motion HD video. All in a splashproof body with manual controls, stereo mic with wind noise-reduction and built-in Wi-Fi. You can even edit your best moves into one video with included Highlight Movie Maker software.


TECHNOLOGY
PROFESSIONAL 4K (3840 X 2160) VIDEO RECORDING WITH UP TO 240P HD / 120P FULL HD
Capture the finest details and your most thrilling moments in true 4k (3840 x 2160) video. The FDR-X1000V 30p/24p allows incredibly high resolution, to produce vibrant and extremely realistic images. The Action Cam is capable of shooting in 10 different shooting modes to create a diverse amount of looks to include 240p in high definition and 120p slow motion in FHD. Users can also select 240p in VGA for super slow motion video. Additionally, pro quality XAVC S recording with high bit rate of 100Mbps in 4k and 60Mbps in HD enables the FDR-X1000V to capture quick action with smooth image motion.

STEADYSHOT IMAGE STABILIZATION WORKS FROM BIKES TO AERIAL SHOT AND MORE
SteadyShot image stabilization with Active Mode compensates for greater degrees of camera shake. SteadyShot image stabilization has evolved to compensate for shake in different shooting scenarios to include different vibration frequencies from land sports to aerial shots on drones.

CONTROL UP TO 5 ACTION CAM VIA PHONE OR LIVEVIEW REMOTE3
Turn compatible smart phones1 and tablets in to remote control viewing devices via Wi-Fi with One Touch Near Field Communication (NFC). When using LiveView Remote RM-LVR2.3 Now you can frame your shot, change the shooting modes, turn on GPS, and control up to 5 Action Cams with the use of a single LiveView Remote or compatible smart phone by simply using the Sony PlayMemories Mobile app (for Android or iOS).


SPLASH PROOF BODY WITH UNIVERSAL TRIPOD MOUNT
The FDR-X1000V was built with a splash proof body (IPX4-class). Enjoy carefree use of the Action Cam outside of its included housing3, even in rainy weather or splash-prone situations. With a universal tripod screw mount on the body of the Action Cam itself, you can easily attach the camera directly to a tripod.

BUILT-IN STEREO MIC FOR QUALITY SOUND WITH WIND NOISE REDUCTION
A built-in stereo microphone allows you to capture all the exciting sounds of your adventure with sense of direction. Wind Reduction reduces noise and interference that is produced when wind passes over the microphone, giving you clearer, cleaner sound.

AUTOMATICALLY CREATES HIGHLIGHT VIDEO IN MP4 FROM MULTIPLE CLIPS
Highlight Movie Maker produces a short highlight movie clip to share and enjoy instantly. Highlight Movie Maker selects the best scenes from your videos based on motion gyro. The movie, which is saved in MP4 format, is easy to share through social media.


ADDITIONAL FEATURES
LOOP RECORDING PREVENTS RUNNING OUT OF MEMORY CARD
Set the recording loop duration from 5/20/60/120 minutes or unlimited. This will help ensure you catch the most thrilling moments of your day without running out of space on your card. No matter what interval you set your loop recording setting to previously recorded content on the card is protected.

LIVE STREAM YOUR VIDEO VIA USTREAM
Share the adventure as it happens via Ustream. Now your circle of friends and family can share the excitement in real time by simply logging in to Ustream from anywhere.

ADVANCED MANUAL CONTROL ALLOWS FLEXIBILITY IN MOVIE EXPRESSION
Advanced manual control of settings such as white balance and AE shifting enable more pro-style movie shooting to meet diverse needs. Adjusting the brightness and hue levels of your video will allow you to match the video shot from other cameras easily, providing a solid baseline for professional-looking movies.


ULTRA WIDE UP TO 170° PRO QUALITY F/2.8 BRIGHT ZEISS LENS
With an ultra-wide angle professional ZEISS lens, you will increase your perspective (up to 170-degree viewing angle) while you venture out on breathtaking views of dynamic terrain to include ski slopes and mountain trails. With SteadyShot turned on you will shoot a wide 120 degrees. With an aperture of f/2.8 this lens helps to produce stunning detail and clarity in low light situations.


1Requires NFC-compatible mobile device. Check device’s user manual for compatibility. Device cases may prevent connection. 3Waterproof down to 3 meters (15feet)

Sony, Exmor R, SteadyShot and the Sony logo are trademarks of Sony Corporation. Wi-Fi is a registered trademark of Wi-Fi Alliance. Carl Zeiss and Vario-Tessar are registered trademarks of Carl Zeiss Inc. All other trademarks are trademarks of their respective owners. Features and specifications subject to change without notice
feature_bullets: Professional 4K (3840 x 2160) video recording with up to 240p HD / 120p HD
SteadyShot image stabilization works from bikes to aerial shot and more
Control up to 5 Action Cam via phone1 or LiveView Remote
Splash proof body with universal tripod mount
Built-in stereo mic for quality sound with wind noise reduction
Automatically creates highlight video in MP4 from multiple clips
Loop recording prevents running out of memory card
Live stream your video via Ustream
Advanced manual control allows flexibility in movie expression
Ultra wide up to 170° pro quality f/2.8 bright ZEISS lens
